component.name: TabBarItem
component.script:
sub init() m.label = m.top.findNode("label") m.top.observeField("itemContent", "onItemContent") m.top.observeField("focusPercent", "onFocus") end sub
sub onItemContent() if m.top.itemContent <> invalid m.label.text = m.top.itemContent.title end if end sub
sub onFocus() if m.top.focusPercent = 1 m.label.color = "0xFFFFFFFF" m.label.font = "font:MediumBoldSystemFont" else m.label.color = "0xA0B4C8FF" m.label.font = "font:MediumSystemFont" end if end sub
